item.title: Using R with Google BigQuery
item.description: Google’s BigQuery has some interesting public datasets and luckily there’s an R package that makes interacting with the data extremely easy. The bigrquery library let’s you use SQL or dplyr statements to query the data which is super helpful. Simple Query I took a look at the data from the US Census Bureauâ€™s International dataset which provides projections on population indicators. You need to create a projectid in the bigquery interface before you start.
